title: Building A Whiter And A Brighter World
description: In 1983, Ben Klassen launched "Racial Loyalty," the monthly publication of his organization, the Church of the Creator (today called Creativity). This book, Building a Whiter and a Brighter World contains selected articles and editorials from issues 13 to 28 of "Racial Loyalty" and includes topics such as "Comparitive Religions: Islam, Judaism, Christianity, Roman Catholicism,"; "Who's Trying to Save What and Whom,"; "How to Overcome the Real Haters,"; "Odinism: A Rising Phoenix of a Dead Horse?," "Our Race is Our Religion,"; "Saving Our Planet-Nuclear Pollution," and much more
